text: Tristan Trevor James Thompson (born March 13, 1991) is a Canadian-Jamaican and American basketball player for the Cleveland Cavaliers. He won the NBA championship with the Cavaliers in 2016. Thompson has also played for the national team of Canada, the Boston Celtics, Sacramento Kings, Indiana Pacers, Chicago Bulls and Los Angeles Lakers. He began dating Khlo√© Kardashian in 2016. They have two children together. It was revealed that Thompson had cheated on Kardashian during her first pregnancy. title: Tristan Thompson
